section.title: Test the Mobile User Interface Using BrowserSim
section.para: Mobile user interfaces are best tested on mobile devices and JBoss Developer Studio provides BrowserSim for this purpose. The procedure below guides you through viewing the TicketMonster application on simulated mobile devices using BrowserSim.

procedure.title: Test the Mobile User Interface Using BrowserSim

step.para: To run BrowserSim, on the toolbar click the BrowserSim icon. A simulated device is displayed.
At the Ready To Go prompt, click Close. The names of the events in the database are displayed.

note.para: If the names of the events in the database are not displayed, check the address bar of the simulated device. The address bar should contain .

step.para: To rotate the mobile device, click in any corner of the simulated device.
To change the type of simulated device displayed, right-click anywhere on the simulated device and select from the different skins listed.
To close BrowserSim, right-click anywhere on the simulated device and click Exit.
